channel.title: PROTOTYPE-POLLUTION on g4nd1v
channel.description: Recent content in PROTOTYPE-POLLUTION on g4nd1v

item.title: Portswigger Prototype Pollution Writeups
item.author: krishnannavadia@gmail.com (g4nd1v)
item.description: 1. Lab: DOM XSS via client-side prototype pollution This lab is vulnerable to DOM XSS via client-side prototype pollution. To solve the lab: Find a source that you can use to add arbitrary properties to the global Object.prototype. Identify a gadget property that allows you to execute arbitrary JavaScript. Combine these to call alert(). You can solve this lab manually in your browser, or use DOM Invader to help you. Using DOM Invader If we check the tab from developers console, we can see we have 2 sources, one is simply changing the property and another one is changing constructor.
item.dc:creator: g4nd1v
